import React, { useState } from 'react'; import Information from '../components/Information' import PlatformLogos from '../components/PlatformLogos' import Content from '../components/Content' import RugbyCarousel from '../components/Carousel/RugbyCarousel' import AFLCarousel from '../components/Carousel/AFLCarousel' import TyCarousel from '../components/Carousel/TyCarousel' import CKCarousel from '../components/Carousel/CKCarousel' import OGICarousel from '../components/Carousel/OGICarousel' import workExamples from "../workExamples" import Rugby from "../Rugby" import AFL from "../AFL" import CK from "../CK" import Ty from "../Ty" import OGI from "../OGI" const Home = () => { const [selectedTitle, newTitle] = useState(0); const [background, newBackground] = useState("url('https://store-images.s-microsoft.com/image/apps.18123.14533227276590283.41248ee4-3267-47b4-aff1-815a0c15ee8a.ca262ffb-a7fa-49ea-8aab-d990cd7d8016')"); function handleChange(value) { return function() { newTitle(value); } } return (

{workExamples[0].title}

{workExamples[1].title}

{workExamples[2].title}

{workExamples[3].title}

{workExamples[4].title}

) } export default Home;
